title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Automation for Modern Operations (AIM219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代运维的AI驱动自动化 (AIM219)
abstract: See how AI-powered automation is revolutionizing digital operations at organizations like Warner Brothers Discovery. AI agents now work across the entire lifecycle, reducing toil by adjusting schedules, diagnosing issues, scribing incidents, executing remediation, and standardizing responses, freeing teams for higher-value work. Discover how organizations apply agentic AI to three types of operational work: well-understood, partially understood, and novel or major events. Learn how to evaluate which tasks are best for agents, where GenAI adds value, and what still demands human expertise so your teams can innovate faster, operate smarter, and continuously improve. This presentation is brought to you by PagerDuty, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解AI驱动的自动化如何在华纳兄弟探索等组织中革命性地改变数字化运营。AI代理现在贯穿整个生命周期，通过调整计划、诊断问题、记录事件、执行修复和标准化响应来减少繁重工作，让团队专注于更高价值的工作。探索组织如何将代理AI应用于三种类型的运营工作：充分理解的、部分理解的，以及新颖或重大事件。学习如何评估哪些任务最适合代理，GenAI在哪里增加价值，以及什么仍需要人类专业知识，让您的团队能够更快创新、更智能运营并持续改进。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PagerDuty提供。

presenter.name: Nora Jones
presenter.title: Head of Product Strategy and Growth
